entry.title: Current Conditions: 0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Algonquin Park East Gate 12:00 PM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa falling
Humidity: 45 %
Dewpoint: -9.8°C
Wind: N 4 km/h

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 4.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 5 this morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Flurries at times heavy beginning near noon and ending late in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h late in the afternoon. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
